original: Ernest, Ernst O’tto N:son, rektor, Dingile, f. 1/4/83 i Högby, östergötl. 1. G. 18 m. Rut Wessén. Barn: Gunnar f. 19, Eva 21, Ragnar 24, Ingrid 28. — Agronomex. i Alnarp 10, stud. jordbr:- o. lantbr .’undervisn. i Danm., Tyskl., Norge O’. Finl. m. Nonnenstip. 12, stat-sstip. 19 o. 32. Lär. v. Bkk. 1. fol’khög- o. lantmisk. 10-11, assist, v. Sthlms 1. fröloontr :anst. 11, lär. v, Jönköp. i. foilkhögsk. i Näsisjö 11-13, förest, f. Gästrikl. lantmisk. i Storvik 13-21, rektor v. Gbgs o. Boh. 1. lantm:- o. lanthush :sk. i Dingle fr. "21. V. ordf. i komm. f. utg. av jordbr lära f. lantm:S/k. m. fl., ordf. i styr. f. lantm :sk. lär :för., i Svarteborgs hus-håliln:gille, Dingleortens and rmejeri, lantbrromb., led. i lantbr :’Styr. därob:-komm., försöksrådet f. jordbruksför-siökj led. av Bohus’!, ikulturminines-råd m. m. Hvitfeldtska stip. 33 o. 35. Skr.: lärob. f. sk. o. självstud. i räkn., lantbr-bokför, m. m. RVO 33.
translated: Ernest, Ernst O'tto N:son, principal, Dingile, born April 1, 1883 in Högby, Östergötland. Married 18 years with Rut Wessén. Children: Gunnar (born) 1919, Eva (born) 1921, Ragnar (born) 1924, Ingrid (born) 1928. Agricultural degree from Alnarp in 1910 and studied agriculture and rural education in Denmark, Germany, Norway, and Finland with a nun scholarship in 1912 and state scholarships in 1919 and 1932. Taught at Bkk. 1. folk high school and agricultural school in 1910-1911, assistant at Stockholm's 1st seed control station in 1911, teacher at Jönköping's folk high school in Nässjö in 1911-1913, head of Gästrikland's agricultural school in Storvik in 1913-1921, and principal at the Gothenburg and Bohus 1st agricultural and domestic school in Dingle from 1921. Deputy chairman of the committee for the publication of agricultural science for rural householders, among others. Chairman of the board for the agricultural school's teacher training program, Svarteborg's household guild, Dingle's dairy, and agricultural promotion. Member of the Agricultural Board of Directors’ committee, test council for agricultural experiments, Bohusian culture heritage board, etc. Received the Hvitfeldtska scholarship in 1933 and 1935. Published textbooks for schools and self-study in arithmetic, agricultural accounting, and more. Awarded the Order of Vasa in 1933.
